author: B
content: Not sure exactly when it's going to happen but when the apple consumers start talking about all the new AI features on their phones, ipads, etc. and how they can't get enough of it this stock will skyrocket.

author: sno
content: Apple's AI is nothing but a souped up SIRI, which I rarely use. AAPL AI is geared towards consumers, not business/enterprise apps. The majority of AAPL's focus on AI is on I Phones. So what. How many businesses will do work solely on an AAPL  IPhone? none. Then, AAPL has a 3% world market share on computers and laptops. Name a single S&P 500 firm that uses AAPL computers exclusively? None do. MSFT owns BUSINESS apps for AI, not AAPL.

author: James
content: Bearish: Warren IS Dumping.....Sitting  on $325 Billion in CASH... the Supply Chain has Never Been so Vulnerable....

author: Victor
content: Bullish: Maintains strong relative strength, driven by robust fundamentals and steady institutional interest. Continuation pattern forming, signaling potential sustained momentum in the tech sector
